sentences.sContent: They found themselves competing with foreign companies for a share of the market.
sentences.sCn: 他们发现自己在与外国公司争夺市场份额。

sentences.sContent: He will be competing in the 100-metre race.
How many runners will be competing in the marathon?
sentences.sCn: 会有多少人参加这次马拉松比赛？

words.tran: 竞争的；比赛的；求胜心切的

remMethod.val: com(共同) ＋ pet(追求， 寻求) ＋ e → 共同追求一个目标 → 竞争

trans.tranOther: if one company or country competes with another, it tries to get people to buy its goods or services rather than those available from another company or country
